node.title: Arsonist appointed head of US volunteer fire department
node.description: Almost every member resigned on the spot.
node.content: ["Almost every member of a volunteer fire department in the US has resigned after their chief was replaced by a man with a conviction for arson.\u00a0", "One even stripped off his uniform and threw his gear on the table in front of Prairie Du Pont Volunteer Fire Department board members when the decision was made, Fox News reported.\u00a0", "The board met on Monday, replacing the former chief with Jerame Simmons, a man who set fire to a vacant home and a high school more than 20 years ago.\u00a0", "Ten of the 13 volunteers quit on the spot.", "\"This letter is to inform you\u2026 with regret and sorrow that the majority membership of the Prairie Du Pont Fire Department below, intends to resign,\" a letter posted to the department's Facebook page read.\u00a0", "The board said it didn't make the decision lightly, but \"it has become apparent to the board over the last few months that a change in the fire department\u2019s leadership is needed\".", "The ousted chief, John Rosenkranz, said he wasn't given any reason for the \"appalling and disgusting\" move.\u00a0", "\"With us stepping back from it all and not being able to run underneath this new chief\u2019s tenure because of it being unsafe, it\u2019s not going to be adequate protection,\" he told Fox.\u00a0", "Simmons claims he's been pardoned for the historic crimes, but Rosenkranz's wife said locals haven't forgotten what he did, claiming some of them were injured fighting the fires Simmons set.\u00a0", "\u00a0"]
